head.title: Delete Watermark for Excel Spreadsheets
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} generates watermark for MS Excel files in applications based on {{EnvName}}, J2SE 7.0 (1.7) or above.

header.title: Delete Watermark for MS Excel Spreadsheets via {{EnvName}}
header.description: Text and image watermark generation for MS Excel files using {{EnvName}} J2SE applications. Watermarks your business documents with BMP, PNG, GIF, and JPEG images or text. Adjust watermark size, alignment, rotation angle, and position on the document pages.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}} API

about.title: {{ProdFullName}} library
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} is a comprehensive solution for managing watermarks using {{EnvName}}. With this tool, developers can easily perform operations such as generation, adjust, search, and clear watermarks from documents in popular file formats. It supports working with both text and image watermarks in a variety of documents, including PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, email, and image formats. {{ProdShortName}} supports all major operating systems and {{EnvName}} versions including J2SE 7.0 (1.7), J2SE 8.0 (1.8) or above.

steps.title: How to generate image watermarks for MS Excel documents using {{EnvName}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to generate image (BMP, PNG, GIF or JPEG) watermarks in their applications by implementing a few easy steps.
content.step_2: Use the image watermark path as the constructor parameter of the **ImageWatermark** class
content.step_3: Set watermark properties (size, alignment, color etc)

comments.comment_1: Add image watermark in your Excel Spreadsheet
comments.comment_2: Create a Watermarker object specifying a source file
comments.comment_4: Get result file protected by watermark

formats.title: Use images as watermarks via {{ProgLang}}
formats.description: Our {{EnvName}} solutions allows to protect various formats of business documents. Watermarked documents may enrich your business processes.
